header.title: Data Analytics Bootcamp
header.desc: Microsoft guided triple certification blended learning course with video lessons and live doubt sessions and live project sessions.
header.firstPoint: Foundations: Programming, Stats, Python Basics, Data Types.
header.fourthPoint: Tools & Visualization: SQL, Excel, Tableau, Power BI.

Module0.title: Module 1
Module0.descS: Through a hands-on approach, you will learn key programming concepts of Python, MatplotLib, Seaborn and languages commonly used in the data science field. Whether you're aspiring to become a data scientist or simply seeking to harness the power of programming for data analysis, this module equips you with the essential skills to manipulate, analyze, and visualize data effectively.

chap.title: Lesson 2: PYTHON INTRODUCTION (1 hrs)
desc: How a Python Program runs on our system?
Features of Python Memory Management in Python,

Module0.title: Module 2
Module0.descS: By the end of the module, you will have mastered statistical tools such as probabilistic theory, hypothesis testing and regression analysis, all in the context of practical data science applications and the knowledge they need to be at the forefront of data science and lead data-driven innovations.

chap.title: Lesson 1:- Probability theory and Statistical Inferences ( 4 hrs )
desc: Discrete Probability Distributions - Binomial, Poisson etc
Continuous Probability Distributions - Gaussian, Normal, etc

chap.title: Lesson 2: Statistics Foundations (1 hrs)
desc: Measures of Central tendency and Dispersion
Sampling theory and scales of measurement

chap.title: Lesson 3: Hypothesis Testing and its Applications (1 hrs)
desc: Basic Concepts - Formulation of Hypothesis, Making a decision
Advanced Concepts - Choice of Test - t test vs z test
Evaluation of Test - P value and Critical Value approach

Module0.title: Module 3
Module0.descS: Unlock the full potential of data science with our comprehensive module on essential tools: Excel, SQL, Tableau, and Power BI and more. Dive into the world of data manipulation, analysis, visualization, and reporting with hands-on training in these industry-standard applications.

chap.title: Lesson 1: Introducation To Power BI
desc: Understanding the Power BI Desktop Workflow.
Exploring the Interface of the Data Model.

chap.title: Lesson 2: Query Editor
desc: Connecting Power BI Desktop to Source Files.

chap.title: Lesson 3: Power BI
desc: Working with Time series Understanding aggregation and granularity
Filters and Slicers in Power BI

Module0.title: Module 4
Module0.descS: Unlock the full potential of data science with our comprehensive module on essential tools: Excel, SQL, Tableau, and Power BI and more. Dive into the world of data manipulation, analysis, visualization, and reporting with hands-on training in these industry-standard applications.

chap.title: Lesson 1: Introduction To Tableau
desc: Different charts on TABLEAU (Bar graphs, Line graphs, Scatter graphs, Crosstabs, Histogram, Heatmap, Tree maps, Bullet graphs, etc.)

chap.title: Lesson 2: Data Types in Tableau
desc: Adding a second layer moving average.

chap.title: Lesson 3: Mapping and Analytics
desc: Creating a map, working with hierarchies.
Image Creating a Scatter Plot, Applying Filters to Multiple Worksheets.

Module0.title: Module 5
Module0.descS: Unlock the full potential of data science with our comprehensive module on essential tools: Excel, SQL, Tableau, and Power BI and more. Dive into the world of data manipulation, analysis, visualization, and reporting with hands-on training in these industry-standard applications.

chap.title: Lesson 1: Introduction to SQL
desc: All about SQL Difference between SQL & MongoDB.
Different Structured Query languages Why MySQL?

FaqDATA.ques: Is this an Advanced level or beginner level course?
FaqDATA.ans: This a basic to advanced level course that is designed in collaboration with Microsoft to make you interview-ready for Data Analytics jobs. Each module is taught in detail by tenured Data Analysts to give you in-depth knowledge and with latest industry practice. Note the content of this course is not static, which means the lessons are updated frequently with current topics & best practices in the field of Data Analytics.

FaqDATA.ques: Can a fresher do this course?
FaqDATA.ans: This course is designed to meet the needs of both experienced professionals and college goers/fresh graduates, providing comprehensive coverage of topics across all levels - from basic to advanced.

FaqDATA.ques: How can I enroll in this course?
FaqDATA.ans: Click on 'Start Learning' on this page. Then click on 'Buy Now'. Fill up your details and click on 'Pay Securely'. Complete the payment process on our Razorpay platform and start your Data Analytics career journey. Note: the payment gateway system is encrypted by Razorpay, hence making it safe and compliant with all banks and financial institutes across the globe.

FaqDATA.ques: How can I get my doubts cleared?
FaqDATA.ans: Every weekend we conduct Trainer-led live clearing sessions where you can unmute and ask your doubts. You can attend unlimited doubt sessions for the next 2 years.

FaqDATA.ques: How will I do the live projects?
FaqDATA.ans: Every weekend we conduct Trainer-led live project sessions, where projects mentioned above on this page will be done live in the class. These Data Analytics projects are from various domains like BFSI, Healthcare, Manufacturing, Retail, Sales, HR & many more. If you are stuck somewhere you can unmute and ask. You can attend unlimited project sessions for the next 2 years from the day of your enrollment.

FaqDATA.ques: Is it a recorded course or live course?
FaqDATA.ans: All lessons are recorded, live classes only for doubt-clearing and project sessions

FaqDATA.ques: How soon can I complete the course?
FaqDATA.ans: This course offers 216 hrs of recorded lessons which you can do at your own pace, on average it takes 3 months to complete. Where you will have access to all recorded lessons for lifetime and live doubt & project sessions for the next 2 years from the date of purchase.

Yes, this course has a refund policy. You can take the refund within 15 days from the purchase date of the product and the course should not be accessed by more than 10%. With no questions ask policy.

FaqDATA.ques: Can I access this course on mobile and tablet?
FaqDATA.ans: Absolutely! Our device-friendly platform allows you to access and learn from our courses on various devices, including smartphones, tablets, laptops, or desktops.

FaqDATA.ques: Will I get a internship certificate in this bootcamp?
FaqDATA.ans: Yes, after you complete at least 3 projects you will get an internship certificate and 3 respective project experience certificates. Once you add these certificates to your resume it will show the hiring manager that you are not new to Data Analytics.

FaqDATA.ques: Is there any validity of the course?
FaqDATA.ans: Once you enroll you have lifetime access to the course content.

FaqDATA.ques: Is Microsoft certificate included in this course?
FaqDATA.ans: Yes, the Microsoft certificate is included in the course fees. You don't need to pay extra for the Microsoft certificate.
